name: moba-mobile-banking
description: Mobile banking app for individuals and businesses.
author: Ernest Irabor <irabeny89@gmail.com>

scripts.githook:pre-push:
echo '#!/bin/sh
set -e
bun run lint && bun test' > .git/hooks/pre-push
scripts.githooks: bun run githook:commit-msg & bun run githook:pre-push
scripts.garage:layout:create: bun garage layout assign -z dc1 -c 1G $(bun garage:node-id)
scripts.garage:bucket:create: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && bun garage bucket create ${STORAGE_BUCKET}
scripts.garage:key:create: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && bun garage key create ${STORAGE_KEY_NAME}
scripts.garage:bucket:allow: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && bun garage bucket allow --read --write --owner ${STORAGE_BUCKET} --key ${STORAGE_KEY_NAME}
scripts.garage:bucket:setup: bun garage:bucket:create && bun garage:key:create && bun garage:bucket:allow
scripts.garage:bucket:info: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && bun garage bucket info ${STORAGE_BUCKET}
